content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the AI to browse the Clockify website and gather information on its features, which include timekeeping, reporting, management, scheduling, and integration capabilities. The software allows users to track time using a timer or manually, log weekly activities, track GPS location, and record expenses. It also offers features for team communication and collaboration, project and task management, and time off tracking. The software is available for desktop and mobile devices and offers integrations with other apps. I then wrote this information to a file called "clockify_features.txt" and confirmed that it was successfully written. I also used the AI to read the file and confirmed that it contained the information on Clockify's features. Finally, I used the AI to search for information on the Pumble app.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://pumble.com/", "question": "What are the features of Pumble?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: an overview of Pumble, a communication and collaboration app for teams. It offers features such as channels, direct messages, threads, file sharing, and video conferencing. Pumble is designed for various industries, including software development, healthcare, and marketing. It has a free plan with unlimited users and message history, and also offers a pro plan with more features. Pumble has received positive reviews for its ease of use and reliability, and offers 24/7 customer support.\n\nLinks: ['\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n (https://pumble.com/)', '\\n\\n\\n\\nPumble\\nTeam communication and collaboration\\n\\n\\n (https://pumble.com/)', '\\n\\n\\n\\nClockify\\nTime and cost tracking\\n\\n\\n (https://clockify.me/)', '\\n\\n\\n\\nPlaky\\nProject and task management\\n\\n\\n (https://plaky.com/)', ' (https://cake.com/)']", type='action_result')]
"""
